casebody.data:
No. 1061,

Misc.

Crider v. Zurich Insurance Co. J. Terry Hujjstutler for petitioner. Frank E. Spain for respondent.

Motion for leave to file supplement to the petition for writ of certiorari granted. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted. Case transferred to the appellate docket.
